snippet.title: Edge of War Early Access Launch Trailer  OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Edge of War delivers an isometric CRPG experience where your choices carve a unique path through the Northlands inspired by Laplands and Finnish Folklore. 

Engage in intricate grid-based combat, leveraging a deeply interactive environment to outmaneuver foes. In this world, every quest holds weight and significance, directly influencing your journey and the others around you. 

With semi-procedural world creation and emergent storytelling, each playthrough offers a distinct narrative and plenty of variety. Venture forth, but remember: mastering the environment is as crucial as mastering the blade.

Get now at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1786070/Edge_of_War/

You can also find at our Discord: https://discord.gg/irondanger
